医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
大脑对意外视觉模式的反应随着时间的推移而变化面对打破预期模式的图像，例如预期有停车标志的请勿进入标志，与显示的与预测相符的图像相比，大脑如何反应和学习？ https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231121/Brains-response-to-unexpected-visual-patterns-evolves-over-time.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231121/Brains-response-to-unexpected-visual-patterns-evolves-over-time.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=193d976d-7ba5-45bc-9733-b07d0d29a231 Tue, 21 Nov 2023 20:54:14 -0500 Brain's response to unexpected visual patterns evolves over time
St. Jude 科学家发现脑部和实体瘤的潜在 CAR T 细胞治疗靶点圣裘德儿童研究医院的研究结果正在使癌症免疫疗法领域向治疗脑肿瘤和实体瘤更近了一步。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231121/St-Jude-scientists-discover-pottial-CAR-T-cell-therapy-target-for-brain-and-solid-tumors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231121/St-Jude-scientists-discover-pottial-CAR-T-cell-therapy-target-for-brain-and-solid-tumors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b41f13ef-9566-48a6-97ed-7a8e6e10a8b2 Tue, 21 Nov 2023 20:32:01 -0500 St. Jude scientists discover potential CAR T cell therapy target for brain and solid tumors
密歇根州立大学研究人员发现肠道炎症导致内脏疼痛的原因密歇根州立大学的研究人员可能已经发现了为什么内脏疼痛在经历过肠道炎症的人中如此常见，包括肠易激综合症（IBS）患者。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231121/MSU-researchers-discover-why-inflammation-in-the-gut-causes-visceral-pain.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231121/MSU-researchers-discover-why-inflammation-in-the-gut-causes-visceral-pain.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=42b39fb9-9230-4ceb-bc42-dcfc43a49023 Tue, 21 Nov 2023 20:25:21 -0500 MSU researchers discover why inflammation in the gut causes visceral pain
德国对含糖饮料实行分级征税可以延长健康寿命并节省数十亿美元根据卡尔·埃默特-费斯 (Karl Emmert-Fees) 领导的一项新研究，在德国，对含糖饮料征税可以预防或推迟 2 型糖尿病的发病，延长健康寿命，并在未来 20 年内节省高达 160 亿欧元的社会成本。慕尼黑工业大学，11 月 21 日发表在开放获取期刊 PLOS Medicine 上。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231121/Tiered-tax-on-sugar-sweetened-beverages-in-Germany-could-extend-healthy-lifespans-and-save-billions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231121/Tiered-tax-on-sugar-sweetened-beverages-in-Germany-could-extend-healthy-lifespans-and-save-billions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8b22b3c3-5b8e-484d-9895-a903a3b7a75d Tue, 21 Nov 2023 20:17:43 -0500 Tiered tax on sugar-sweetened beverages in Germany could extend healthy lifespans and save billions
科学家发现增强抗癌T细胞的关键T 细胞是参与杀死癌症的关键免疫系统成分。肿瘤会产生关闭这些 T 细胞的信号，部分原因是迫使它们逐渐分化（成熟）进入一种功能低下的状态，即“衰竭”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231121/Scientists-uncover-key-to-enhancing-cancer-killing-T-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231121/Scientists-uncover-key-to-enhancing-cancer-killing-T-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6cae1ee1-fbdb-494a-9c70-4806b78205e8 Tue, 21 Nov 2023 20:11:13 -0500 Scientists uncover key to enhancing cancer-killing T cells
神经退行性疾病的新疗法可能在用过的咖啡渣中找到神经退行性疾病，包括阿尔茨海默氏症、帕金森氏症和亨廷顿氏症，影响着美国数百万人，每年护理这些疾病患者的费用总计高达数千亿美元。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231121/New-treatment-for-neurodogenic-diseases-may-be-found-in-used-coffee-grounds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231121/New-treatment-for-neurodogenic-diseases-may-be-found-in-used-coffee-grounds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0fc61ed3-1a1d-40bb-ad3d-837274ccb650 Tue, 21 Nov 2023 19:44:34 -0500 New treatment for neurodegenerative diseases may be found in used coffee grounds
治疗软骨发育不全儿童的药物可能有助于减少 SIDS 的风险一项新的研究表明，一种促进患有最常见侏儒症的儿童骨骼生长的药物也可能减少他们患婴儿猝死综合症、睡眠呼吸暂停和需要手术的机会。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231121/Drug-for-children-with-achondroplasia-may-help-reduce-chances-of-SIDS.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231121/Drug-for-children-with-achondroplasia-may-help-reduce-chances-of-SIDS.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=baaee3ec-b6a7-4fd3-bec7-25177e7d3a95 Tue, 21 Nov 2023 19:38:50 -0500 Drug for children with achondroplasia may help reduce chances of SIDS
AHRI 与 BGI Genomics 合作，提升其基因组学和精准医疗能力2023 年 10 月 13 日，阿毛尔汉森研究所 (AHRI) 与华大基因在亚的斯亚贝巴签署了一份谅解备忘录，以增强该研究所的基因组学和精准医疗能力。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231121/AHRI-partners-with-BGI-Genomics-to-boost-its-genomics-and- precision-medicine-capability.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231121/AHRI-partners-with-BGI-Genomics-to-boost-its-genomics-and- precision-medicine-capability.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=e85e5e70-0836-4e85-83e5-25ee931c1bdf Tue, 21 Nov 2023 19:19:04 -0500 AHRI partners with BGI Genomics to boost its genomics and precision medicine capabilities
新项目探讨南美精神病院去机构化的影响一个重大的新研究项目将探讨南美洲心理健康治疗的转型变化的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231121/New-project-to-explore-impact-of-psychiatric-deinstitutionalization-in-South-America.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231121/New-project-to-explore-impact-of-psychiatric-deinstitutionalization-in-South-America.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c3bbcd38-7449-4613-a3ef-3febc86618f6 Tue, 21 Nov 2023 14:55:53 -0500 New project to explore impact of psychiatric deinstitutionalization in South America
长期关闭急症护理医院可能会对患者护理产生意想不到的后果长期急性护理医院 (LTCH) 是对需要长期机械通气的严重呼吸衰竭康复患者进行急性后护理的常见场所。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231121/Long-term-acute-care-hospital-closures-may-have-unintending-consequences-for-病人-care.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231121/Long-term-acute-care-hospital-closures-may-have-unintending-consequences-for-病人-care.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bd66abd6-cccd-4831-9628-1c0c409d068d Tue, 21 Nov 2023 14:50:50 -0500 Long-term acute care hospital closures may have unintended consequences for patient care
